languages.text: {n}Простолюдины с ликованием приняли весть о своей победе. Насмехаясь над "золочеными священниками", они громогласно молились за Вольного Торговца. {/n}
{n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Простолюдины с ликованием приняли весть о своей победе. Насмехаясь над "золочеными священниками", они громогласно молились за Вольного Торговца. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the 'gilded priests', they gave a loud prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}
{n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the 'gilded priests', they gave a loud prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}普通百姓为他们胜利而欢欣鼓舞。他们嘲笑国教代理人为‘镀金牧师’，为行商浪人献上了雷鸣般的祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}普通百姓为他们胜利而欢欣鼓舞。他们嘲笑国教代理人为‘镀金牧师’，为行商浪人献上了雷鸣般的祈祷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La gente común se regocijó con la noticia de su victoria. Burlándose de los «sacerdotes dorados», elevaron una estruendosa plegaria por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente común se regocijó con la noticia de su victoria. Burlándose de los «sacerdotes dorados», elevaron una estruendosa plegaria por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}勝利の知らせに民は歓喜した。彼らは'金箔のお飾り司祭'を嘲笑い、ローグトレーダーのために轟き渡るような祈りを捧げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}勝利の知らせに民は歓喜した。彼らは'金箔のお飾り司祭'を嘲笑い、ローグトレーダーのために轟き渡るような祈りを捧げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La population se réjouit de cette victoire, se moquant ouvertement des « prêtres dorés », elle adresse une prière d'une incroyable ferveur {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La population se réjouit de cette victoire, se moquant ouvertement des « prêtres dorés », elle adresse une prière d'une incroyable ferveur {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das gemeine Volk brach ob seines Sieges in Jubel aus. Sie verspotteten die 'vergoldeten Priester' und sprachen ein leidenschaftliches Gebet für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das gemeine Volk brach ob seines Sieges in Jubel aus. Sie verspotteten die 'vergoldeten Priester' und sprachen ein leidenschaftliches Gebet für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}.{/n}
{n}Der Pöbel brach ob seines Sieges in Jubel aus. Sie verspotteten die 'vergoldeten Priester' und beteten mit donnernden Stimmen {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıradan yurttaşlar, galibiyetlerinin haberleri karşısında neşeyle doldu. "Yaldızlı rahipler" ile alay ederek Hür Tacir'e gök gürültüsü misali gümbürdeyen bir dua bahşettiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The common folk rejoiced at the news of their victory. Scoffing at the "gilded priests," they offered up a thunderous prayer for the Rogue Trader.{/n}
